name: Ansible + Bitwarden CLI + Kubernetes + OpenTofu
description: Develop applications using Ansible, Bitwarden CLI, Kubernetes and OpenTofu

imageVariant.description: Python version (use -bookworm, or -bullseye variants on local arm64/Apple Silicon):

additionalPythonPackages.description: A comma-separated list of python packages you want to include in the devcontainer. Example: `requests,pytest,flask`

additionnalAnsibleCollections.description: A comma-separated list of ansible collections you want to include in the devcontainer. Example: `community.docker,ansible.posix,kubernetes.core`
